perturbation.original_text: The Software License and Maintenance will be provided at no charge.
perturbation.changed_text: The Software License will be provided at no charge. The Maintenance fees will be subject to the Time and Materials rates set forth in the Price List, unless explicitly stated otherwise in a subsequent amendment.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by stating that maintenance fees will be charged based on Time and Materials, while the original text stated it would be provided at no charge. This creates uncertainty and potential disputes over payment for maintenance services.

perturbation.original_text: During the initial Maintenance Term and any renewal term, Maintenance Fees shall be paid in the increments described below under "Payment Terms."
perturbation.changed_text: During the initial Maintenance Term, Maintenance Fees shall be paid in the increments described below under "Payment Terms." However, for any renewal term, the maintenance fees will be subject to negotiation, and shall not necessarily follow the same increments, unless Bank of America agrees.
perturbation.explanation: This change creates a contradiction regarding payment terms for maintenance fees. The original text states that fees are paid in increments described in "Payment Terms" during the initial and renewal terms. The modified text introduces uncertainty for renewal terms, stating fees are subject to negotiation and may not follow the same increments, thus conflicting with the initial assertion.

perturbation.original_text: Notwithstanding anything set forth elsewhere in this Agreement (or below), the Maintenance Period shall be twenty- four (24) hours per day, seven (7) days per week, including Bank of America holidays.
perturbation.changed_text: Notwithstanding anything set forth elsewhere in this Agreement (or below), the Maintenance Period shall be twenty- four (24) hours per day, seven (7) days per week. However, maintenance during Bank of America holidays will be provided on a best-effort basis and may incur additional charges, unless provided under the original service level agreement.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction. The original text states that maintenance is provided 24/7, including Bank of America holidays, without exception. The modified text creates an exception for holidays, stating that maintenance is provided on a best-effort basis and may incur additional charges during those times, thus conflicting with the earlier statement.
